turns.content:
Describe delicious-looking tomato spaghetti in 100 characters or less
Answer in English.지금 번역하기
"Tantalizing tomato spaghetti bursting with flavor in every bite. A savory sensation to savor."

Describe the appearance of delicious-looking tomato spaghetti in 100 characters or less
Answer in English.지금 번역하기
"Vibrant red tomato sauce coating long, tender strands of spaghetti, garnished with fresh herbs and grated Parmesan."
